Text:
I'm always seeding, as long as there isn't a blackout here or I don't have the complete file.  So far, this is stuck at 47 %.

I ask that anyone that does finish the downloads PLEASE stay seeding.  All the other torrents (Disks 2 - 6) have no seeders, sans for me, always because people download them and then leave the torrent.  I am not one to seed stuff (I seed to .50...and I stop after I download my file) but these files are pretty ok and we should encourage their distribution.  

So, if DavetheNave ever decides to finish seeding this, then please stay seeding for others.
Ok, seems davethenave has abandoned us all...tried....its already been like a month and a half with this torrent at the beginning...

As of Feb 7 2007


I see 83-131-94-74 has 48% of this file


I'm doing my part to fill in missing parts. Then I'll upload the rest of the 25 set mp4 files.


Help me.


After you get a complete file leave it on for share.

Personally, I've been dling these for a week or so now and I've got three episodes on my HDs and a couple more due for completion today.  I'll continue to seed them.  Hang in there, good things take time!

This video course is much better than the Live class offered by TEFLINTERNATIONAL.

Thank you:

All who  seed this series of 25 disk. It's a long list and large files.

I'm asking your help. 

Please... After you complete a download Leave it to seed until a couple more people can take your place.

I've tried off and on for more than a year to make this teaching course available.

This is my last run. 

I'll be off the net in a couple of weeks. 

It's up to you whether these torrents live or die.

BEFORE you put down money for any TEFL / TESOL course take 3 minutes to download and read:
